Package equipments.CookingPlate

Interface CookingPlateImplementationI

All Known Subinterfaces:
CookingPlateUserCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
CookingPlate, CookingPlateConnector, CookingPlateInboundPort, CookingPlateOutboundPort
public interface CookingPlateImplementationI
The interface CookingPlateImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the cooking plate component.

Description

Black-box Invariant 

 invariant      
 true
         // no invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES

  • Field Details

    • CookingPlateTemperature

      static final int[] CookingPlateTemperature
      Array of CookingPlateMode describes the operation modes of the cooking plate.

      Description

      The cooking plate has 8 modes, from 0 to 7, from the coldest to the hottest temperature.

      Created on : 2023-10-10

 post   getMode() == CookingPlateMode.MODE_1
